trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell 指令程式

trans-unit.source: Remove-PSSnapin
trans-unit.target: Remove-PSSnapin

trans-unit.source: Remove-PSSnapin
trans-unit.target: Remove-PSSnapin

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 概要

trans-unit.source: Removes Windows PowerShell snap-ins from the current session.
trans-unit.target: 從目前的工作階段中移除 Windows PowerShell 嵌入式管理單元。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 語法

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The Remove-PSSnapin cmdlet removes a Windows PowerShell snap-in from the current session.
trans-unit.target: Remove-PSSnapin Cmdlet 會從目前的工作階段中移除 Windows PowerShell 嵌入式管理單元。

trans-unit.source: You can use it to remove snap-ins that you have added to Windows PowerShell, but you cannot use it to remove the snap-ins that are installed with Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用它來移除您已新增到 Windows PowerShell 的嵌入式管理單元，但您無法使用它來移除與 Windows Powershell 一起安裝的嵌入式管理單元。

trans-unit.source: After a snap-in is removed from the current session, it is still loaded, but the cmdlets and providers in the snap-in are no longer available in the session.
trans-unit.target: 從目前的工作階段移除嵌入式管理單元之後，它仍然處於載入的狀態，但是嵌入式管理單元中的 Cmdlet 與提供者於工作階段中已無法使用。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: This command removes the Microsoft.Exchange snap-in from the current session.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會從目前工作階段移除 Microsoft.Exchange 嵌入式管理單元。

trans-unit.source: When the command is complete, the cmdlets and providers that the snap-in supported are not available in the session.
trans-unit.target: 當命令完成時，嵌入式管理單元支援的 Cmdlet 和提供者於工作階段中將無法使用。

trans-unit.source: This command removes the Windows PowerShell snap-ins that have names beginning with "smp" from the current session.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會從目前工作階段移除名稱開頭為 "smp" 的 Windows PowerShell 嵌入式管理單元。

trans-unit.source: The command uses the Get-PSSnapin cmdlet to get objects representing the snap-ins.
trans-unit.target: 命令使用 Get-PSSnapin Cmdlet 取得代表嵌入式管理單元的物件。

trans-unit.source: The pipeline operator (|) sends the results to the Remove-PSSnapin cmdlet, which removes them from the session.
trans-unit.target: 管線運算子 (|) 會將結果傳送至 Remove-PSSnapin Cmdlet，然後從工作階段中移除。

trans-unit.source: The providers and cmdlets that this snap-in supports are no longer available in the session.
trans-unit.target: 這個嵌入式管理單元支援的提供者與 Cmdlet 於工作階段中將無法使用。

trans-unit.source: When you pipe objects to Remove-PSSnapin, the names of the objects are associated with the Name parameter, which accepts objects from the pipeline that have a Name property.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用管線將物件傳送至 Remove-PSSnapin，物件名稱會與 Name 參數相關聯，它會接受管線中具有 Name 參數的物件。

trans-unit.source: This command removes all Windows PowerShell snap-ins that have names that include "event".
trans-unit.target: 此命令會移除所有名稱中包含 "event" 的 Windows PowerShell 嵌入式管理單元。

trans-unit.source: This command specifies the "Name" parameter name, but the parameter name can be omitted because it is optional.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會指定 "Name" 參數名稱，但可以省略參數名稱，因為它為選擇性。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 參數

trans-unit.source: -Confirm
trans-unit.target: -Confirm

trans-unit.source: Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 會提示您進行確認，然後再執行此指令程式。會提示您進行確認，然後再執行此指令程式。

trans-unit.source: -Name
trans-unit.target: -Name

trans-unit.source: Specifies the names of Windows PowerShell snap-ins to remove from the current session.
trans-unit.target: 指定要從目前工作階段中移除的 Windows PowerShell 嵌入式管理單元名稱。

trans-unit.source: The parameter name ("Name") is optional, and wildcard characters (*) are permitted in the value.
trans-unit.target: 參數名稱 ("Name") 為選擇性，且值允許使用萬用字元 (*)。

trans-unit.source: -PassThru
trans-unit.target: -PassThru

trans-unit.source: Returns an object representing the snap-in.
trans-unit.target: 傳回代表嵌入式管理單元的物件。

trans-unit.source: By default, this cmdlet does not generate any output.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，此 Cmdlet 不會產生任何輸出。

trans-unit.source: -WhatIf
trans-unit.target: -WhatIf

trans-unit.source: Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 顯示執行 Cmdlet 後會發生的情況。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 無法執行此指令程式。顯示執行此指令程式會發生什麼事。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.
trans-unit.target: 未執行 Cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 這個 cmdlet 支援一般參數:-偵錯、-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 以及-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸入

trans-unit.source: System.Management.Automation.PSSnapInInfo
trans-unit.target: System.Management.Automation.PSSnapInInfo

trans-unit.source: You can pipe a snap-in object to Remove-PSSnapin.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用管線將嵌入式管理單元物件傳送至 Remove-PSSnapin。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸出

trans-unit.source: None or System.Management.Automation.PSSnapInInfo
trans-unit.target: 無或 System.Management.Automation.PSSnapInInfo

trans-unit.source: By default, Remove-PsSnapin does not generate any output.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，Remove-PsSnapin 不會產生任何輸出。

trans-unit.source: However, if you use the PassThru parameter, it generates a System.Management.Automation.PSSnapInInfo object representing the snap-in.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果您使用 PassThru 參數，它會產生代表嵌入式管理單元的 System.Management.Automation.PSSnapInInfo 物件。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 附註

trans-unit.source: You can also refer to Remove-PSSnapin by its built-in alias, "rsnp".
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用內建的別名 "rsnp" 來參照 Remove-PSSnapin。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Aliases.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_Aliases。

trans-unit.source: Remove-PSSnapin does not check the version of Windows PowerShell before removing a snap-in from the session.
trans-unit.target: 在從工作階段移除嵌入式管理單元之前，Remove-PSSnapin 不會檢查 Windows PowerShell 版本。

trans-unit.source: If a snap-in cannot be removed, a warning appears and the command fails.
trans-unit.target: 如果嵌入式管理單元不可移除，則會出現警告，且命令會失敗。

trans-unit.source: Remove-PSSnapin affects only the current session.
trans-unit.target: Remove-PSSnapin 只影響目前的工作階段。

trans-unit.source: If you have added an Add-PSSnapin command to your Windows PowerShell profile, you should delete the command to remove the snap-in from future sessions.
trans-unit.target: 如果已將 Add-PSSnapin 命令新增到 Windows PowerShell 設定檔，您應該刪除命令以從未來工作階段移除嵌入式管理單元。

trans-unit.source: For instructions, see about_Profiles.
trans-unit.target: 如需相關指示，請參閱 about_Profiles。

trans-unit.source: RELATED LINKS
trans-unit.target: 相關的連結

trans-unit.target: Add-PSSnapin

trans-unit.target: Get-PSSnapin
